column4: why is it when i start my ymessenger as normal user it goes back to the set-up but when i start ym as root that's the only time when it starts the already installed ym application? thanks
probably you were logged in as root when you configured it
so i have to reinstall it as normal user? thanks
in modern systems there really is no need to defrag period, if you have anything vaguely acceptable as a file system
